Languages: Understands Common and Abyssal but cannot speak

Traits.Name: Spectral Presence
Traits.Content: The Black Hound of Dead has an aura of dread. Creatures within 10 feet of it must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of their next turn.

Traits.Name: Silent Stalker
Traits.Content: The Black Hound has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks when in dim light or darkness.

Traits.Name: Spellcasting
Traits.Content: The Black Hound of Dead's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: minor illusion, thorn whip; 1/day each: curse of the fallen, shadow blade.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Black Hound of Dead makes three melee attacks: one with its Bite and two with its Claws.

Actions.Name: Bite
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take an additional 7 (2d6) necrotic damage at the start of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Claw
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.

Actions.Name: Spectral Whirlwind
Actions.Content: The Black Hound summons a whirlwind of spectral energy around it, making a melee attack against each creature within 10 feet. Each target takes 13 (2d8 + 4) force damage, and must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Primary Ranged Attack
Actions.Content: Ranged Attack: +7 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) psychic damage as a chilling howling echoes through the target's mind.

Actions.Name: Reaction
Actions.Content: The Black Hound uses a Reaction to add 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the creature must see the attacker, and as it does, a spectral form momentarily appears, startling the assailant.
